Installing the Python Toolbox¶

Requirements¶

  • Python, version 2.5 or above. If you’re new to Python, download version 2.7.
  • distribute.

Installation¶

The simplest way to install the Python Toolbox is using pip:

  • pip install python_toolbox

    • Installation
